verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012> <WH8734> against the shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, prophesy <WH5012> <WH8734>, and say <WH559> <WH8804> unto them, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> unto the shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802>; Woe <WH1945> be to the shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> that do feed <WH7462> <WH8802> themselves! should not the shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802> feed <WH7462> <WH8799> the flocks <WH6629> ?

Ye eat <WH398> <WH8799> the fat <WH2459>, and ye clothe <WH3847> <WH8799> you with the wool <WH6785>, ye kill <WH2076> <WH8799> them that are fed <WH1277>: but ye feed <WH7462> <WH8799> not the flock <WH6629>.

The diseased <WH2470> <WH8737> have ye not strengthened <WH2388> <WH8765>, neither have ye healed <WH7495> <WH8765> that which was sick <WH2470> <WH8802>, neither have ye bound up <WH2280> <WH8804> that which was broken <WH7665> <WH8737>, neither have ye brought again <WH7725> <WH8689> that which was driven away <WH5080> <WH8737>, neither have ye sought <WH1245> <WH8765> that which was lost <WH6> <WH8802>; but with force <WH2394> and with cruelty <WH6531> have ye ruled <WH7287> <WH8804> them.

And they were scattered <WH6327> <WH8799>, because there is no shepherd <WH7462> <WH8802>: and they became meat <WH402> to all the beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>, when they were scattered <WH6327> <WH8799>.

My sheep <WH6629> wandered <WH7686> <WH8799> through all the mountains <WH2022>, and upon every high <WH7311> <WH8802> hill <WH1389>: yea, my flock <WH6629> was scattered <WH6327> <WH8738> upon all the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH776>, and none did search <WH1875> <WH8802> or seek <WH1245> <WH8764> after them.
Therefore, ye shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802>, hear <WH8085> <WH8798> the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>;

As I live <WH2416>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, surely because my flock <WH6629> became a prey <WH957>, and my flock <WH6629> became meat <WH402> to every beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>, because there was no shepherd <WH7462> <WH8802>, neither did my shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802> search <WH1875> <WH8804> for my flock <WH6629>, but the shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802> fed <WH7462> <WH8799> themselves, and fed <WH7462> <WH8804> not my flock <WH6629>;
Therefore, O ye shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802>, hear <WH8085> <WH8798> the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>;

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I am against the shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802>; and I will require <WH1875> <WH8804> my flock <WH6629> at their hand <WH3027>, and cause them to cease <WH7673> <WH8689> from feeding <WH7462> <WH8800> the flock <WH6629>; neither shall the shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802> feed <WH7462> <WH8799> themselves any more; for I will deliver <WH5337> <WH8689> my flock <WH6629> from their mouth <WH6310>, that they may not be meat <WH402> for them.
For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I, even I, will both search <WH1875> <WH8804> my sheep <WH6629>, and seek them out <WH1239> <WH8765>.

As a shepherd <WH7462> <WH8802> seeketh out <WH1243> his flock <WH5739> in the day <WH3117> that he is among <WH8432> his sheep <WH6629> that are scattered <WH6567> <WH8737>; so will I seek out <WH1239> <WH8762> my sheep <WH6629>, and will deliver <WH5337> <WH8689> them out of all places <WH4725> where they have been scattered <WH6327> <WH8738> in the cloudy <WH6051> and dark <WH6205> day <WH3117>.

And I will bring them out <WH3318> <WH8689> from the people <WH5971>, and gather <WH6908> <WH8765> them from the countries <WH776>, and will bring <WH935> <WH8689> them to their own land <WH127>, and feed <WH7462> <WH8804> them upon the mountains <WH2022> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> by the rivers <WH650>, and in all the inhabited places <WH4186> of the country <WH776>.

I will feed <WH7462> <WH8799> them in a good <WH2896> pasture <WH4829>, and upon the high <WH4791> mountains <WH2022> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall their fold <WH5116> be: there shall they lie <WH7257> <WH8799> in a good <WH2896> fold <WH5116>, and in a fat <WH8082> pasture <WH4829> shall they feed <WH7462> <WH8799> upon the mountains <WH2022> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
I will feed <WH7462> <WH8799> my flock <WH6629>, and I will cause them to lie down <WH7257> <WH8686>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

I will seek <WH1245> <WH8762> that which was lost <WH6> <WH8802>, and bring again <WH7725> <WH8686> that which was driven away <WH5080> <WH8737>, and will bind up <WH2280> <WH8799> that which was broken <WH7665> <WH8737>, and will strengthen <WH2388> <WH8762> that which was sick <WH2470> <WH8802>: but I will destroy <WH8045> <WH8686> the fat <WH8082> and the strong <WH2389>; I will feed <WH7462> <WH8799> them with judgment <WH4941>.

And as for you <WH859>, O my flock <WH6629>, thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I judge <WH8199> <WH8802> between cattle <WH7716> and cattle <WH7716>, between the rams <WH352> and the he goats <WH6260>.

Seemeth it a small thing <WH4592> unto you to have eaten up <WH7462> <WH8799> the good <WH2896> pasture <WH4829>, but ye must tread down <WH7429> <WH8799> with your feet <WH7272> the residue <WH3499> of your pastures <WH4829>? and to have drunk <WH8354> <WH8799> of the deep <WH4950> waters <WH4325>, but ye must foul <WH7515> <WH8799> the residue <WH3498> <WH8737> with your feet <WH7272> ?

And as for my flock <WH6629>, they eat <WH7462> <WH8799> that which ye have trodden <WH4823> with your feet <WH7272>; and they drink <WH8354> <WH8799> that which ye have fouled <WH4833> with your feet <WH7272>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> unto them; Behold, I, even I, will judge <WH8199> <WH8804> between the fat <WH1274> cattle <WH7716> and between the lean <WH7330> cattle <WH7716>.

Because ye have thrust <WH1920> <WH8799> with side <WH6654> and with shoulder <WH3802>, and pushed <WH5055> <WH8762> all the diseased <WH2470> <WH8737> with your shofars <WH7161>, till ye have scattered <WH6327> <WH8689> them abroad <WH2351>;
Therefore will I save <WH3467> <WH8689> my flock <WH6629>, and they shall no more be a prey <WH957>; and I will judge <WH8199> <WH8804> between cattle <WH7716> and cattle <WH7716>.

And I will set up <WH6965> <WH8689> one <WH259> shepherd <WH7462> <WH8802> over them, and he shall feed <WH7462> <WH8804> them, even my servant <WH5650> David <WH1732>; he shall feed <WH7462> <WH8799> them, and he shall be their shepherd <WH7462> <WH8802>.
And I the YY <WH3068> will be their 'Elohim <WH430>, and my servant <WH5650> David <WH1732> a prince <WH5387> among <WH8432> them; I the YY <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> it.

And I will make <WH3772> <WH8804> with them a covenant <WH1285> of peace <WH7965>, and will cause the evil <WH7451> beasts <WH2416> to cease <WH7673> <WH8689> out of the land <WH776>: and they shall dwell <WH3427> <WH8804> safely <WH983> in the wilderness <WH4057>, and sleep <WH3462> <WH8804> in the woods <WH3293> <WH8675> <WH3264>.

And I will make <WH5414> <WH8804> them and the places round about <WH5439> my hill <WH1389> a b'rakhah <WH1293>; and I will cause the shower <WH1653> to come down <WH3381> <WH8689> in his season <WH6256>; there shall be showers <WH1653> of b'rakhah <WH1293>.

And the tree <WH6086> of the field <WH7704> shall yield <WH5414> <WH8804> her fruit <WH6529>, and the earth <WH776> shall yield <WH5414> <WH8799> her increase <WH2981>, and they shall be safe <WH983> in their land <WH127>, and shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>, when I have broken <WH7665> <WH8800> the bands <WH4133> of their yoke <WH5923>, and delivered <WH5337> <WH8689> them out of the hand <WH3027> of those that served <WH5647> <WH8802> themselves of them.

And they shall no more be a prey <WH957> to the heathen <WH1471>, neither shall the beast <WH2416> of the land <WH776> devour <WH398> <WH8799> them; but they shall dwell <WH3427> <WH8804> safely <WH983>, and none shall make them afraid <WH2729> <WH8688>.

And I will raise up <WH6965> <WH8689> for them a plant <WH4302> of renown <WH8034>, and they shall be no more consumed <WH622> <WH8803> with hunger <WH7458> in the land <WH776>, neither bear <WH5375> <WH8799> the shame <WH3639> of the heathen <WH1471> any more.

Thus shall they know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I the YY <WH3068> their 'Elohim <WH430> am with them, and that they, even the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, are my people <WH5971>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
And ye <WH859> my flock <WH6629>, the flock <WH6629> of my pasture <WH4830>, are men <WH120>, and I am your 'Elohim <WH430>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
